title: Sora â€” AI Tool Review
description: Sora is OpenAI's text-to-video model that generates realistic, high-definition video clips from text descriptions with cinematic quality. Sora is OpenAI's groundbreaking text-to-video generation model that can create realistic, coherent videos up to 60 seconds from text prompts. It's been praised for understanding physical world simulations, maintaining consistent characters across scenes, and producing cinematically compelling output. Available to ChatGPT Plus and Pro subscribers. Highlights: Cinematic quality video generation. Long coherent videos (up to 60s). Multiple aspect ratios. Strong physical world understanding. OpenAI ecosystem integration.
